data.system_settings: Samsung Galaxy S7 edge (SM-G935F), Android Nougat 7.0
data.expected_result: The app should load more users as you scroll down like desktop version.
data.short_description: App doesn't load more than 100 reactions
data.steps_to_repro: - Find a message more than 100 people reacted with the same emoji to. It's better to choose a message with thousands of the same reaction because it will be easier to observe the issue. - Press hold on the message and select "Reactions" - Scroll all the way down to the bottom and notice that the app only loaded 100 users and unlike desktop version, it doesn't load more users as your scroll down.
